name: InstaBetter
author: Jake0oo0
description: The most comprehensive tweak for Instagram yet.

1.1.1: Fix bug with zooming on short captions
1.1.2: Fix crash related to no captions
1.1.3: Fix invalid ringer state on load
Replace 'Save Media' and 'Share' with new buttons under images and videos
1.1.4: Add minor change to possibly lower memory usage
Fix crash when viewing profile image in activity tab
Fix share/save images not showing on 6+ - s/o to ThisBeChrisSas for testing
1.2.0: Revert to old style of Saving/Sharing. Now more consistent
Fix both Twitter buttons opening to the same page
Add preferences view to Instagram's settings
Add ability to customize whether or not to auto play videos
Fix zoom/share attempting to display several times
1.3.0: Fix muting not working for some users
Revamp custom locations. Now select a location from a map, add a name and address.
Add a toggle for displaying buttons or action sheet for saving/sharing
Add confirmation to saving content with save button
Remove activity from muted users from the activity feed. Only removes items where just a single user is involved.
Add action list to DM photos rather than immediately zooming. Includes zoom and save.
1.3.1: Submit the correct version to BigBoss
1.3.2: Make it possible to access native Instagram share sheet on own posts
Change save and share buttons to activate on inside touch events
Redo settings as a popup to fix black screen on iOS 9
Add done button to web view
Potentially fix freezing on app start
1.3.3: Fix 7.9 crash when zooming on profile pics
Fix 7.9 crash when using account switcher
1.3.4: Add Restart Instagram button to settings
Add option to disable like confirmation for save button
1.4.0: Add done button to Instagram web view
Rewrite preference loading to reduce preference file size and hopefully resolve crashes
Add return key to captions and comments to create multiline posts and comments (use two blank lines between each)
1.4.1: Fix Russian translation not displaying correctly
Fix potential crash in activity tab
1.4.4: Fix crash when opening action menus
Remove like percentages. They caused too many issues, including the No Internet Connection bug. They also display terribly with the latest updates.
1.4.5: Fix mute/save/share buttons not appearing in menus
Rewrite muting to support future versions
Add fake verified symbol, similar to spoofing followers
Make spoofed followers/following/verified only appear for your profile
Support return key in future versions
1.4.6: Fix DM image saving displaying wrong text
Fix crash when double clicking to like photos
Fix grid mode still being enabled with InstaBetter disabled
1.4.7: Fix not being able to save images/videos from action menu
1.4.8: Fix muted posts still appearing sometimes
Add InstaMute as a conflict to prevent issues
Use Safari Web Views for opening links in supported iOS versions
1.4.9: Remove muted users and sponsored posts from the grid view
Add options for only muting the main feed and/or the activity feed
1.5.0: Fix crash when sharing your own posts - thanks Justin!
Fix your own posts not being savable
Fix profile picture zooming. You can now double tap on profile pictures to zoom
Make profile zooming only work on the actual profiles, not in feeds/timelines
Make profile pictures high-res when zooming
Possibly make whitelist mode work on activity feed (activity feed muting needs more testing)
1.5.1: Fix profile pictures not using their default action
Another attempt at fixing muted posts reappearing
Potentially fix double tap like confirmations
Fix disabling auto playing videos didn't work
